body:
Add variant `par_file`: `Par_file` is simulation configuration file included in the `specfem3d-globe` package.
By editing this file and building, a binary that reflects the configuration will be output.

By specifying the edited `Par_file` in this variant with the full path, it is possible to build with any settings.

e.g.
```
$ spack install specfem3d-globe par_file=/home/path_to_par_file/Par_file
```
title: specfem3d-globe: Add variant to specify modified parameter file.
